alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Juneau (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 27 at 11:59AM AKST until December 27 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...VERY GUSTY WINDS FOR DOWNTOWN JUNEAU AND DOUGLAS THROUGH THIS EVENING... .Mountain wave conditions have formed and started to gust to 60 mph near sea level. Expect the gusts to increase through the afternoon and evening. ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...East winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...City and Borough of Juneau. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...High winds will blow around unsecured objects and may damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure vessels and loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. Report any damage to the National Weather Service by visiting weather.gov/Juneau/StormReports
